reviews.review: Nice game with cool features like gambling for children, toxic teammates and loud Russians. Recommend if you like to blame others for losing.

Broken matchmaking and dropping player base in NA makes this game impossible to play. If you're not in the EU, you're going to be matched with players either way better than you or have completely new players playing against you with no in between.
The community is toxic and so dedicated that getting into the game is practically impossible if you didn't play very early on. You have to study the game and even then you won't get out of the early ranks without a full team and constant practice.
As if the matchmaking isn't bad enough, you're bound to encounter a cheater or a smurf every other game. You NEED o use a 3rd party platform for effective matchmaking, often which will charge you extra.

If it wasn't for the fact that this is the only shooter like it where advantage hangs purely in skill and the map you play, and not just picking the best hero, I would have switched to a different game a long time ago.
